scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/basic run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run build && npm --prefix packages/knowledge run build && npm --prefix packages/server run build && npm --prefix packages/web-fancy run build
scripts.build:dev: npm --prefix packages/basic run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run build && npm --prefix packages/knowledge run build && npm --prefix packages/server run build && npm --prefix packages/web-fancy run build:dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/dist-* packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo node_modules/.cache
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm --prefix packages/server run dev
scripts.dev:both: npm run build && (npm --prefix packages/server run dev & npm --prefix packages/web-fancy run dev)
scripts.test: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/orbital run test && npm --prefix packages/server run test:security:basic
scripts.test:server: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/server run test:all
